# Horoscope Application - Vietnamese Astrology App

## Project Overview
Full-stack horoscope application with:
- **Backend**: ASP.NET Core Web API
- **Frontend**: Angular
- **Language**: Vietnamese support for zodiac signs and horoscopes

## Project Structure
- `/Backend` - ASP.NET Core Web API
- `/Frontend` - Angular application
